reference.shortdesc: The taskbody element contains the body of a task topic. The task body can include prerequisites, contextual information, steps, results, an example, troubleshooting information, and post-requisites.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The content model of the taskbody element depends on the type of task topic used.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The taskbody element is specialized from body. It is defined in the task module.
